channel.title: DJ Lurch Presents . . . theZONE
channel.description: DJ Lurch presents . . . theZONE a new 60 minute mix podcast/radio show playing a variety of dance music including Retro, Funky House, Electro and Trance to name but a few. The Show is also available to hear LIVE on the internet radio station www.reachonair.com check the schedule for more details or visit www.djlurch.tk
channel.itunes:subtitle: 60 Minute Mix from DJ Lurch
channel.itunes:author: DJ Lurch
channel.itunes:summary: DJ Lurch presents . . . theZONE a new 60 minute mix podcast/radio show playing a variety of dance music including Retro, Funky House, Electro and Trance to name but a few. The Show is also available to hear LIVE on the internet radio station www.reachonair.com check the schedule for more details or visit www.djlurch.tk

item.title: Episode 10 - Last EVER Mix
item.description: 01) Solu Music Ft Kimblee - Fade (Grant Nelson Big Room Vocal Mix - Wez Clarke Re-Edit) 02) Alan Braxe & Fred Flake - Intro 03) Layo & Bushwacka - Finally (A Love Story) 04) Sterling Void - It's Alright (Chris Lake Funky House Remix) 05) Axwell - I Found You (Classical Mix) 06) Axwell - I Found You (Axwell's Remode) 07) Dave Spoon - Bad Girl (At Night) 08) Mason vs Princess Superstar - Perfect Exceeder (Martijn 09) Ten Velden Vocal Remix) 10) Hoxton Whores - Friday Saturday 11) Ida Corr - Let Me Think About It (Bad Behaviour Boys Remix) 12) Chris Lake - Changes (Dirty South Remix) 13) Artificial Funk - Never Alone (Funk Agenda Vs Trophy Twins Remix) 14) Armand Van Helden - You Don't Even Know Me (Fat Choons Remix) 15) Mylo - In My Arms (Tocadisco Remix) 16) Jamiroqui - Deeper Underground (Paul Jackson Version Excursion) 17) Black Ghosts - Face (Switch Remix) 18) Splitter - All Alone 19) Duke - So In Love With You 20) Teamsters - Feels Like Love 21) Atlantis Vs Avatar - Fiji 22) Energy 52 - Cafe Del Mar (Three 'n' One Remix) 23) Tiesto - Adagio For Strings 24) David Guetta feat Chril Willis - Time 25) Mint Royale - Singin' In The Rain
